text: Who among these was a brother to Peter?
Which of the following disciples was called from the tax office by Jesus?
explanation:
Levi and Matthew are actuallythe same person:
InMark 2:14andLuke 5:27–29, the man at the tax office is calledLevi, son of Alphaeus.InMatthew 9:9, the same event is described, but the tax collector is calledMatthew.
From this, Bible scholars generally agree thatLevi is another name for Matthew, the disciple who later became one of the twelve apostles and the traditional author of the Gospel of Matthew.
